wariomod:EndlessBlast.NAME: Endless Blast
wariomod:EndlessBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL πTransform a random Empty Space into a Space with this card's effects. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:Leap.NAME: Extended Jump
wariomod:Leap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL wariomod:Move !M!.

wariomod:Leapslam.NAME: Jumpslam
wariomod:Leapslam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL wariomod:Move !M!.

wariomod:DoubleDip.NAME: Double Dip
wariomod:DoubleDip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Activate the Space 3 ahead of you. NL wariomod:Move 3.
wariomod:DoubleDip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Activate the Space 3 ahead of you twice. NL wariomod:Move 3.

wariomod:Kaboom.NAME: KABOOM!
wariomod:Kaboom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:DisarmingMoves.NAME: Confounding Moves
wariomod:DisarmingMoves.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL wariomod:Move 1. NL wariomod:Move 1.

wariomod:Bombshield.NAME: Bombshield
wariomod:Bombshield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Kaboom into your discard pile. Draw !M! card.
wariomod:Bombshield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Kaboom into your discard pile. Draw !M! cards.

wariomod:SmallSprint.NAME: Smol Sprint
wariomod:SmallSprint.DESCRIPTION: wariomod:Move !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

wariomod:ChargeForth.NAME: Charge Forth
wariomod:ChargeForth.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. wariomod:Move 1. NL If you landed on an Empty Space, repeat this.
wariomod:ChargeForth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. wariomod:Move 1. NL If you landed on an Empty Space, repeat this. NL Draw 1 card.

wariomod:Game.NAME: Game
wariomod:Game.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL wariomod:Move !M!. NL If you passed Go, deal !D! damage again.

wariomod:Goblast.NAME: Go-Blast
wariomod:Goblast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're on Go, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
wariomod:Goblast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you're on Go, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

wariomod:Smackflip.NAME: Smackflip
wariomod:Smackflip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL wariomod:Move 1.

wariomod:SimpleShield.NAME: Sideways Barrier
wariomod:SimpleShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Activate the Space you're on.

wariomod:DanceDash.NAME: Dance Dash
wariomod:DanceDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL wariomod:Move 3. NL Gain !B! Block. NL wariomod:Move 2.

wariomod:BumRush.NAME: Bum Rush
wariomod:BumRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Activate the Space you're on.

wariomod:PayItForwards.NAME: Pay It Forwards
wariomod:PayItForwards.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL πTransform 2 random Empty Spaces into wariomod:Spike_Spaces. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:Bomblaster.NAME: Bomblaster
wariomod:Bomblaster.DESCRIPTION: πTransform 2 random Empty Spaces into wariomod:Kaboom_Spaces. NL Whenever you land on a wariomod:Kaboom_Space, gain !M! Strength for that turn.

wariomod:ThatsNotAll.NAME: That's Not All!
wariomod:ThatsNotAll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're on a positive Space, deal !D! damage again.

wariomod:EnergizedBombs.NAME: Energized Bombs
wariomod:EnergizedBombs.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever a *Kaboom goes boom, gain [E] .

wariomod:HappyHop.NAME: Happy Hop
wariomod:HappyHop.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Gain !B! Block. NL wariomod:Move 3. NL Draw !M! card.
wariomod:HappyHop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Gain !B! Block. NL wariomod:Move 3. NL Draw !M! cards.

wariomod:DiceyMove.NAME: Dicey Move
wariomod:DiceyMove.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL wariomod:Move up to 6 Spaces.

wariomod:DeepDig.NAME: Deep Dig
wariomod:DeepDig.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Strength. NL πTransform !M! random Empty Spaces into wariomod:Strength_Spaces.

wariomod:f.NAME: f
wariomod:f.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL πTransform 2 random Spaces into wariomod:Doom_Spaces.

wariomod:TheGrandJourney.NAME: The Grand Journey
wariomod:TheGrandJourney.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL wariomod:Move 3 X+1 times. NL Refund 1.
wariomod:TheGrandJourney.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL wariomod:Move 3 X+2 times. NL Refund 1.

wariomod:TrekTime.NAME: Trek Time!
wariomod:TrekTime.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a card into your hand that wariomod:Moves up to !M! Spaces.

wariomod:HastyBite.NAME: Hasty Bite
wariomod:HastyBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL wariomod:Move 3.

wariomod:ImFeelingLucky.NAME: I'm Feeling Lucky!
wariomod:ImFeelingLucky.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL wariomod:Move !M!. NL If you land on a negative Space, ignore it and gain [E] and !B! Block.

wariomod:Immortalize.NAME: Immortalize
wariomod:Immortalize.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Attacks of any color. NL πTransform !M! random Empty Spaces into Spaces with those card's effects. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:WipeClean.NAME: Wipe Clean
wariomod:WipeClean.DESCRIPTION: πTransform ALL negative Spaces into Empty Spaces. NL Exhaust.
wariomod:WipeClean.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL πTransform ALL negative Spaces into Empty Spaces. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:SpacialMastery.NAME: Spacial Mastery
wariomod:SpacialMastery.DESCRIPTION: wariomod:Move any number of Spaces. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:Sidestep.NAME: Cheat Death
wariomod:Sidestep.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. NL πTransform !M! random Spaces into wariomod:Doom_Spaces.

wariomod:MassiveParty.NAME: Massive Party
wariomod:MassiveParty.DESCRIPTION: Activate all positive Spaces. NL Exhaust.
wariomod:MassiveParty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Activate all positive Spaces. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

wariomod:VeryLongJump.NAME: Very Long Jump
wariomod:VeryLongJump.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL wariomod:Move !M!.

wariomod:DeadlyDash.NAME: Deadly Dash
wariomod:DeadlyDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL wariomod:Move 1. NL If you land on a positive Space, play this again.

wariomod:GoAgain.NAME: Go Again
wariomod:GoAgain.DESCRIPTION: πTransform a random Empty Space into a wariomod:Go_Space. NL Exhaust.
wariomod:GoAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL πTransform a random Empty Space into a wariomod:Go_Space. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:RacingSpeed.NAME: Racing Speed
wariomod:RacingSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you pass Go, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL wariomod:Move !M!.

wariomod:GreaterGuard.NAME: Greater Guard
wariomod:GreaterGuard.DESCRIPTION: πTransform 2 random Empty Spaces into wariomod:Block_Spaces. NL wariomod:Block_Spaces grant !M! Block next turn.

wariomod:TempestBlasts.NAME: Tempest Blasts
wariomod:TempestBlasts.DESCRIPTION: πTransform 2 random Empty Spaces into wariomod:Damage_Spaces. NL wariomod:Damage_Spaces deal !M! additional damage.

wariomod:PoisonBombs.NAME: Poisoned Bombs
wariomod:PoisonBombs.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Kaboom goes boom, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 1 *Kaboom into your draw and discard piles.

wariomod:Enshrine.NAME: Enshrine
wariomod:Enshrine.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card in your hand. Transform !M! random Empty Spaces into spaces with its effects. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:SelfImprison.NAME: Self Imprison
wariomod:SelfImprison.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Travel directly to Jail. Do not pass Go.

wariomod:HastyRush.NAME: bruh
wariomod:HastyRush.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL πTransform 2 random Spaces into wariomod:Doom_Spaces.

wariomod:NullJump.NAME: Null Jump
wariomod:NullJump.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL wariomod:Move 5. NL πTransform all Spaces between start and destination into Empty Spaces.

wariomod:ShipSmash.NAME: Ship Smash
wariomod:ShipSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of each of your turns, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

wariomod:AbandonGame.NAME: Game Over
wariomod:AbandonGame.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You can no longer wariomod:Move. NL Whenever you would wariomod:Move, deal that much damage to ALL enemies instead.
wariomod:AbandonGame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You can no longer wariomod:Move. NL Whenever you would wariomod:Move, deal that much damage to ALL enemies instead.

wariomod:GodlyGift.NAME: Godly Gift
wariomod:GodlyGift.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: πTransform a random Empty Space into a wariomod:Intangible_Space.
wariomod:GodlyGift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: πTransform a random negative Space into a wariomod:Intangible_Space.

wariomod:KeyFinisher.NAME: The Key Finisher
wariomod:KeyFinisher.DESCRIPTION: Spaces you land on are activated twice.

wariomod:EmptyMind.NAME: Emptied Mind
wariomod:EmptyMind.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you're on an Empty Space, gain !M! Block.

wariomod:SpaceSwap.NAME: Space Swap
wariomod:SpaceSwap.DESCRIPTION: Swap two Spaces on the Board. NL Exhaust.
wariomod:SpaceSwap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap two Spaces on the Board.

wariomod:BigUpgrade.NAME: Big Upgrade
wariomod:BigUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Space. NL It activates when passed as well as landed upon. NL Exhaust.
wariomod:BigUpgrade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Space. NL It activates when passed as well as landed upon. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

wariomod:Hopshield.NAME: Hopshield
wariomod:Hopshield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you're on a negative Space, gain !B! Block again. NL wariomod:Move !M!.

wariomod:DonateDraw.NAME: Donate Draw
wariomod:DonateDraw.DESCRIPTION: πTransform !M! random Empty Space into a wariomod:Draw_Space. NL wariomod:Draw_Spaces draw 1 card when passed.
wariomod:DonateDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: πTransform !M! random Empty Spaces into wariomod:Draw_Spaces. NL wariomod:Draw_Spaces draw 1 card when passed.

wariomod:HatMove.NAME: Hat Move
wariomod:HatMove.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL wariomod:Move up to !M! Spaces. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:TrekMove.NAME: Trek Move
wariomod:TrekMove.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL wariomod:Move up to !M! Spaces. NL Exhaust.

wariomod:AwfulLook.NAME: Awful Look
wariomod:AwfulLook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL wariomod:Move 1.

wariomod:DamnedStrength.NAME: pog
wariomod:DamnedStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL πTransform 2 random Spaces into wariomod:Doom_Spaces.

wariomod:SilenceBombs.NAME: Blockbombs
wariomod:SilenceBombs.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Kaboom goes boom, gain 2 Block. NL Add 1 *Kaboom into your discard pile.
wariomod:SilenceBombs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Kaboom goes boom, gain 2 Block. NL Shuffle 1 *Kaboom into your discard and draw piles.

wariomod:Boomsmack.NAME: Boomsmack
wariomod:Boomsmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle 1 *Kaboom into your draw pile.
wariomod:Boomsmack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle 1 *Kaboom+ into your draw pile.

wariomod:SuperHatMove.NAME: Super Hat Move
wariomod:SuperHatMove.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL wariomod:Move any number of Spaces. NL Exhaust.
wariomod:SuperHatMove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL wariomod:Move any number of Spaces.

wariomod:HappyHit.NAME: Happy Hit
wariomod:HappyHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Activate the next positive Space.
wariomod:HappyHit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Activate the next 2 positive Spaces.

wariomod:OctoJump.NAME: Octo Jump
wariomod:OctoJump.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL wariomod:Move !M!. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
wariomod:OctoJump.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL wariomod:Move !M!. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

wariomod:SpikeSlash.NAME: Spike Slash
wariomod:SpikeSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL πTransform the space you're on into a wariomod:Spike_Space. NL wariomod:Move 1.

wariomod:ForbiddenMagic.NAME: Forbidden Magic
wariomod:ForbiddenMagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Weak. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust 2 cards. NL wariomod:Move 2.

wariomod:CommuneWithCreator.NAME: Commune With Creator
wariomod:CommuneWithCreator.DESCRIPTION: Thanks for playing for so long! Type in a message and send it to the me (the mod creator), then remove this from your deck and obtain a random Relic.
